page.title: 20Problems of the area
page.content: The main problem that people in the area were concerned with was not being able to get into Cheltenham and Tewksbury. Bus services have been cut, a private bus service does operate,but it does not give a realy good service, people must rely on cars. School children have to go long distances on a school bus. There are no shops in the villages, this is a great disadvantage. There are few entertainments, this is particularly hard on the young. One person said "Living her is a pain in the neck", but others like the peace of the countryside. They fear any plan to build any large estate or factory in the area. Some people resent the motorway which splits the area and makes a continual drone. Most people liked living in the area.
